snippet: Three Polk Awards, announced by Long Island University, went to The New York Times for international, health and justice reporting.
abstract: Winners of George Polk Awards in Journalism for 2014 are announced.
lead_paragraph: Three Polk Awards, announced by Long Island University, went to The New York Times for international, health and justice reporting.

headline.main: Polk Awards in Journalism Are Announced, Including Three for The Times
headline.print_headline: Polk Awards in Journalism Are Announced, Including Three for the Times
